description:
As a logged in user, you can create a passkey as additional login method, which is a totally awesome, passwordless, usernameless method to log in!

Before you can create a new passkey, use this `GetPasskeyChallenge` service to obtain a challenge and some information from the server, push that through WebAuthn using
`navigator.credentials.create` to create the credential, which you use to call `CreatePasskey`.

:point_right: See `CreatePasskey` for more details!
